original_text: And when they were come, and had gathered the church together, they rehearsed all that God had done with them, and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles.
korean_text: 그들이 이르러 교회를 모아 하나님이 함께 행하신 모든 일과 이방인들에게 믿음의 문을 여신 것을 보고하고

sentences.original_text: and had gathered the church together
they rehearsed all that God had done with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 자기들과 함께 하신 모든 것을 이야기했으며

sentences.original_text: and how he had opened the door of faith
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 어떻게 믿음의 문을 열었는지
